Package ec.singlestate

Class SingleStateBreeder

java.lang.Object
ec.Breeder
ec.singlestate.SingleStateBreeder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Setup, Singleton, Serializable
public class SingleStateBreeder extends Breeder
A very simple single-threaded breeder with optional elitism.

Parameters

base.elite.i
int >= 0 (default=0)		 (will subpopulation i include ONE elite individual?)
base.expanded-subpop-size.i
int >= 1 (default=not resized)		 What is the expanded size of the subpopulation after generation 0?

Default Base
ec.subpop

Parameter bases

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ermo Wei and David Freelan

    • breedPopulation

      public Population breedPopulation(EvolutionState state)
      Description copied from class: Breeder
      Breeds state.population, returning a new population. In general, state.population should not be modified.
